name: Skeletons and Skulls
description:
CONTROLS: WASD to move, left mouse button to attack, 1,2 and 3 number keys to summon skeletons.

This is a submission to the Brackeys 2021.1 game jam. The theme was "Stronger together" so i made a game about a necromancer who summons skeletons to help himself.

(Download the standalone if the web version lags too much)
